text: Ara tadera kache amadera suspasta ayatasamuha tila'oyata kara hale apani kapheradera mukhamandale asantosa dekhate pabena. Yara tadera kache amadera ayata tila'oyata kare taderake tara akramana karate udyata haya. Baluna, ‘tabe ki ami tomaderake era ceye'o manda kichura sambada deba? --- Eta aguna [1]. Yara kuphari kare allah‌ taderake era pratisruti diyechena. Ara eta kata nikrsta phire ya'oyara sthana!’
